question: What is the theme of the World Meteorological Day 2020, celebrated across the world?
option2: The Sun, the Earth and the Weather
explanation:
World Meteorological Day is celebrated on 23rd March of every year, which commemorates the inception of the Convention which established the World Meteorological Organization on the same day in 1950. 
Since 1961, the Geneva headquartered World Meteorological Organization has been celebrating World Meteorological Day with a unique theme.  “Climate and Water” is the theme of this year’s World Meteorological Day.
